content:
I apologize for the mistake, here is a corrected list of 15 fast thrash metal songs (90 bpm or faster) from bands not in the "big 4" with no duplicates:

* "A Lesson in Violence" by Exodus
* "Eternal Nightmare" by Vio-Lence
* "Painkiller" by Judas Priest
* "Agent Orange" by Sodom
* "The Conjuring" by Possessed
* "The American Way" by Sacred Reich
* "Phobia" by Kreator
* "The Ultra-Violence" by Death Angel
* "Malleus Maleficarum" by Pestilence
* "Hello from the Gutter" by Overkill
* "Forbidden Evil" by Forbidden
* "Empire of the Blind" by Heathen
* "Black Magic" by Slayer
* "Symptom of the Universe" by Black Sabbath
* "Judas Rise" by Demolition Hammer
